page.title: 06Trade (2)
page.content: North Shields shopping centre was opened in 1978.It is in Bedford Parade off Bedford Street and links with Northumberland Square.It is a busy place all the buses stop in Bedford Street and it is close to the Metro Station.There are a lot of shops Bakers,Chemist's,Butchers,Radio and Electrical goods.There are also clothing shops ,Chain stores,Banks, Travel Agents and others.It is good to have a shopping centre because who don't have to travel far to do your shopping.The shopping centre is also connected to the main library for North Tyneside which is in Northumberland Square. by Joanne Miller
